website_summaries.verdict: A king bed frame that brings a hint of elegance to your bedroom's decor.
pros: Equipped with carbon steel panels for structure, and rounded finial posts that give the frame a sleek, sophisticated appearance
Includes iron rails, cross arms and feet that are masterfully crafted for outstanding quality
Provides an unbeatable blend of style and function
cons: Does not come with side rails

customer_reviews.title: Great farmhouse bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bed frame! Was so easy and quick to put together. Some reviews said there is a space between the end rail and mattress and it is true. My husband modified it and put the pieces on the inside instead of the outside and it saved 3 inches. Cheaper on Amazon than other sites!
customer_reviews.author: Chefferson

customer_reviews.title: Love ...
customer_reviews.text: Only thing to know is don’t tighten the headboard till the feet are in place and you’ve made sure angles are straight....yes I was dumb enough to make this mistake🤦🏽‍♀️😄... that being said I love this bed it’s perfect, I love the matte black finish... my box spring and mattress are about 12 in each and I still have plenty of head board showing. I absolutely recommend this bed...
customer_reviews.author: Alycia

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous & perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the easy assembly with fantastic instructions. It came with a frame, headboard and footboard. We used it with our king box springs and king mattress. It is lovely and completely perfect. Sturdy well made iron. Looks like a $2,000 + king bed set. I’m impressed and might buy this in a twin for our daughter. This was a grand purchase. It feels wonderful and looks fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: Britta H

customer_reviews.title: The beds are great. I ordered two for my guest bedroom
customer_reviews.text: The beds are great. I ordered two for my guest bedroom. They are very sturdy, even for an adult. Look great too. (Ignore the blue night stand. That's temporary).
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed sizing a little off
customer_reviews.text: I love this frame! It’s so beautiful and looks great! Only reason I’m giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because the sizing seems very off. I ordered a king and it is about 3 inches to wide for my bed. My husband and I were able to make it work, but it didn’t fit as perfectly as I would have liked. Other than that it’s a beautiful frame!
customer_reviews.author: Triann Coker

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love!!! I've looked everywhere for a Bed frame for months since I'm so picky. I finally ordered this and have been in love. So easy to put together. And looks just like the picture. I love the matte finish . Already got so many compliments & it goes with my rustic / farmhouse style perfectly 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure my box was dropped during shipment
customer_reviews.text: The bar along the top was slightly bent when I received it (doesn't affect the structural integrity, but you can see it from across the room). I'm pretty sure my box was dropped during shipment. Otherwise, I found this easy to put together and my bed feels very sturdy. I love that the frame came with the headboard and foot board, so I didn't have to worry about compatibility and how it fits together. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking frame for the price, albeit had a dented headboard on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for the price. Sadly the headboard top rail was bent on arrival. Our new mattress was arriving and we couldn't wait for a new bed. I turned it over, put my foot at the bend and pulled. That took the bend out and it looks good as gold. Easy to assemble and it looks good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: awraynor

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this bed (full) for my teenage daughter, and I am so impressed. It is very sturdy and well made. I had no trouble putting it together. The design is well thought out. I would not hesitate to recommend this bed, and we looked a long time before selecting this one.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The headboard and footboard were a bit high for my mattress set. To solve this, I built a frame, to set in the frame, to lift up the box spring and mattress to get them to the height shown in the product picture. (One of the reasons I chose this set was to have the footboard at the height shown in relation to the top of the mattress.) All-in-all this is a nice bed for a nice price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at the right price.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is awesome. My husband put it together in fifteen minutes. It is exactly how it looks and is built well (so far). I bought a box spring to bring the bed up, otherwise it would sit too low with only a matress. The other reviews were very helpful. I don't see any issue with space for pillows to fall at the head or foot. I might buy this in a queen for another room.
customer_reviews.author: FASTGIRL

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, at a great price, very easy to assemble didn't even need to read the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Goodridge

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful bed frame
customer_reviews.text: I love the graceful simplicity of this bed frame. I can’t speak to the ease of assembly because I wasn’t in the room, but I will say it went quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Light Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Despite the picture, when buying the full size frame you will not receive the middle support bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Love the matte black finish on the bed. It looks so classy in our room.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame! It is sturdy, substantial and looks fantastic! No doubt, this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Bed Group/concerns
customer_reviews.text: i ordered this bed based on the positive reviews, less one negative, and believed it would be what I wanted. Very lightweight and did not have slats for the frame. Box was torn in several places. It was approved for a return, but when I went to the UPS store it cost me $125.00 to return it. I will never get duped like this again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical but wanted to give this bed a try. This by far was the easiest bed to put together, 15 minutes! I am only a 5'4" female and I had no problems whatsoever. The bed is sturdier than I had anticipated, I did not think so at first but once all together it is pretty impressive. I even put it through the kid test and my 4 and 5 year olds spent about an hour jumping on it, not one noise, so I am pretty pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful classic bed frame
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed frame!! Very sturdy, very easy to assemble and very beautiful to look at!! Highly recommend this piece!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bed, looks just like the picture, I liked it because it has a matte finish and isn't shiny. The only thing I didn't like was the headboard is really high. We have a low profile boxspring and had to cut the headboard down otherwise your pillows are falling behind the bed. Other than that can't be it for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to assemble and the finish is great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble and the finish is great. The instructions for the frame were a little difficult to understand at times... Our bed looks great now!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful! Easy to put together, pairs well with my new dressers and night stands I bought. It is very sturdy and elegant looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great bed frame set.
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a king headboard/footboard frame set and this one was perfect for our room. Easy to assemble and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well I don't write many reviews but I'll keep it short and sweet. This set is pretty much a very high quality bed frame with the attachable head board and feet board. Comes shipped in two packages. I highly recommend this quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was easy, I did it by myself in about 30 minutes. The bed is nice and sturdy as long as you get the bolts tight. Will fit with any decor. I am very pleased with this piece, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: bakemeacake

customer_reviews.title: Needs frame
customer_reviews.text: When buying a headboard with footboard they show also offer the correct frame. Most frames only support headboards and mounting holes are critical. I had to buy a frame, but none were offered at the time I purchased the set. As for the item, its fine.
customer_reviews.author: John Ahrens

customer_reviews.title: Fashion Bed Group sanford bed matte black
customer_reviews.text: It was half the price, the same bed frame is in the Sturbridge magazine, it is sturdy, easy to put together, looks great. The only thing is there is a gap between the headboard and where the bed stops, so you loose your pillows at night, but we just stuffed our decorative pillows in that space.
customer_reviews.author: zephydale7

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would not recommend to anyone that has kids that will crawl on ...
customer_reviews.text: Declarative frame is very flimsy, material is too thin walled. Definitely would not recommend to anyone that has kids that will crawl on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame
customer_reviews.text: This frame is a little light but seems worth the money. It was easy to assemble and so far no problems. If you want a more sturdy frame spend more money but this is for a spare bedroom and will not be used much. It looks nice and will be perfect for my room.
customer_reviews.author: dennis warner

customer_reviews.title: I love it and find it perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely and classic. I love it and find it perfect, but it isn't the sturdiest. If you plan to be testing its strength you might have some issues. But if you're more delicate (at least 90% of the time) it's great.
customer_reviews.author: suzi

customer_reviews.title: FULL/QUEEN size isn't accurate
customer_reviews.text: The color is a gloss black. Not matte. But still a very nice bed. Yet, I ordered a FULL size and recieved a QUEEN. It took me days to get ahold of the company and no one knew what they were talking about with their products. Some said itll fit the FULL but its impossible since there is so much overhang. And others said that theyll send me the FULL and I never recieved it. I was also told that there is no Full size in this bed and that the "FULL" is the Queen. So order a full and save your money buy not ordering the queen. Company is a complete scam.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but not all inclusive
customer_reviews.text: The head and foot boards are very nice looking but it is just that...no side rails. Those have to be ordered separately. Additionally the instructions don't have enough information and are a bit confusing. I have it now so I'll make it work but I wouldn't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: False information given
customer_reviews.text: It clearly states that it comes with the frame and it DOES NOT!!!!! There is the headboard, foot board and leg extenders for the headboard! This is false advertising and people should get money back!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: only came with the headboard and footboard, had to go out and get the rest myself - not as described
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: This bed is beautiful. It was pretty easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bed is beautiful. It was pretty easy to assemble, we did most of it without referring to the instructions. The bed is very sturdy and elegant looking in our new bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Graham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smart looking and at a great price. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: CAROL TATE

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got the full for my bedrooma nd the twin for my spare room and I love them! Easy to put together and very sturdy bed!! If you live in a small apartment this size is perfect for a smaller room!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xinjie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed frame!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this for a few months and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Brie Alaimo

customer_reviews.title: much nicer than I thought
customer_reviews.text: The bed is much nicer than how it shows on the picture and the people at fashion bed group are extremely nice. I called them for clarification before I purchased the bed and they were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: cafe

customer_reviews.title: Great price....nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. I purchased two for my new guest room. Assembling the bed was a simple process.
customer_reviews.author: J. Versweyveld

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up and I love the way they ...
customer_reviews.text: These were complete, easy to set up and I love the way they look. What a fantastic buy! The frames were included.
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Feels pretty sturdy. Really like the design
customer_reviews.text: Received all the necessary parts. Fits my mattress well (not having any issues with sizeable gaps at the head or foot of the mattress). Feels pretty sturdy. Really like the design, which is why I bought it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set after searching for a headboard/footboard combo that didn't look too bulky in our small-ish master bedroom. This bed fit the bill perfectly! The frame holds our queen size mattress wonderfully, but it is longer (head to foot) then the mattress, so we lost a few inches in that direction. My husband centered the mattress on the frame and after a few weeks of using it I stopped noticing the extra length. I am very pleased with this purchase and when my son moves out of his crib I'll be looking here again!
customer_reviews.author: photog_grrl

customer_reviews.title: Missing Piece?
customer_reviews.text: I originally saw this bed from Sleepys but I couldn't bring myself to spend $500 on just a bed frame. I really love this bed and I am thrilled I bought it off of Amazon! Although the bed looks and feels great, I think there is a piece missing. I purchased a full and there is NO center support. Did anyone else have a similar issue? The photo instructions that came with my bed showed a center support, but there was no center support found in the box? I'm not sure if the support is for King or Queen beds only...but the photo shows the center support...
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I had been looking for
customer_reviews.text: The bed came earlier than expected. Very easy to assemble (hubby is not the greatest handyman). We will be using it in a small guest bedroom and the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: wanda

customer_reviews.title: Getting good use out of it
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few guests use the bed so far and they really enjoy it and it looks great in the room.The assembly was fairly easy. The only downside is that I was expecting it to be a little more weighted. It feels a little cheap, but definitely doesn't look like it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach F

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bed. It was very easy to assemble, hardly had to look at the instructions and no more than the use of an Allen wrench was needed. I don't think it took an hour to put together. It's sturdy and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: amazing!(:
customer_reviews.text: This bed is simply amazing! it is low to the ground but with the box spring it's perfect! i am so happy with my purchase. it was so easy to put together as well! i'm an 18 year old female and i did it by myself with in a couple of hours!!
customer_reviews.author: Kana Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great bed for a great price! Sturdy. Looks great. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Kristin widzinski

customer_reviews.title: Quality not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I read nearly 100 reviews of this bed on this and other sites before purchasing. I was impressed with the prompt and free delivery, but I was disappointed in the quality. It isn't very heavy at all, especially the foot board. Moreover, you can clearly see where pieces have been soldered together. It doesn't look particularly well made. While shipping was free, I had to pay to ship it back, which was expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and well priced.
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky on putting the inner frame together, little instructions, but once done it is great. it looks great and it was very well priced
customer_reviews.author: Theizzy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is so sturdy and was easy to put together. It looks great in our bedroom! Could't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Height of box spring from floor is only 7 inches ...
customer_reviews.text: Height of box spring from floor is only 7 inches not 17 inches as listed so I deducted one star. I was hoping for more storage space under bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together-I did it myself with the allen wrench that came with the screws. Very sturdy. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: gebocem

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bed!
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy, but we'll have to wait on that. Have only slept on it one night so far. Love the matte finish, rather than shiny. I'm a huge fan of wrought iron, and this is beautiful, in my opinion. It requires a spring mattress. Update: It's been 4+ months since I bought this. Very sturdy. Doesn't shake. Best bed I've owned in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: wool girl

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Would recommend Fashion Bed Group thru Amazon. We already have purchased from Fashion Bed Group thru a furniture store and paid more for just the headboard in a smaller size in 2012. I didn't see as many style choices from Amazon, but love what we did order.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: looks very cheap. Dont waste your money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very cheap and completely not worth the money. Also it does not match the picture shown at all. In the picture it's a very dark gray and it has a different design
customer_reviews.author: ktina

customer_reviews.title: Could not be happier
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the worst from this based on the price, but I'm so glad I made this purchase. It's a beautiful bed, construction wasn't difficult and it is very sturdy. Don't pass this up!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Anyone make quality anymore?
customer_reviews.text: Great for people that like to waste money and for people that like to rebuy. This thing is cheap and has a gap between the headboard and mattress that loves to eat pillows.
customer_reviews.author: O. Family Account

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. Although the first frame was damaged and I had to return it and the head and foot boards, the process was fairly easy. After receiving the new bed it was very easy to assemble. It looks great and is very sturdy. The quality is good. I'd purchase it again if I needed another metal bed.
customer_reviews.author: goodness

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far and easy to assemble. The directions may be a little difficult to understand. The bed is pictured as another leg but I think it shows a leg of a headboard
customer_reviews.author: J. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love the bed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks great in our vacation home. Would recommend this bed to anyone who wants a good looking bed at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: ECM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bed
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! Love this bed frame. Very easy to assemble and looks great in my guest bedroom. Just wish there were matching matte black night stands to match.
customer_reviews.author: vicki opecko

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bed for about a week and a half now and I love it. it was fairly easy to assemble and I love the look of it. it seems sturdy but I don't weigh much and I've not had it long. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: sjessee

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my room
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the style and quality..the picture really does not do it justice.I have recommended this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: weesie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS
customer_reviews.text: My order only came with a headboard and footboard. No rails or frame. I have an existing King sized frame however it is impossible to attach the footboard to the frame. I am getting a complete run around by the seller. Like another review, they are telling me to purchase another frame from Amazon or local store and they will refund my money... really I am supposed to believe this? Also the finish is shiny, not a matte finish. Mine came with scratches, a damaged box and it does not completely match the picture, the spindles are different.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Hollow metal headboard and footboard with cheap hardware that, while it's not impossible, is unnecessarily difficult to screw together. Price is stupid for a headboard and footboard?
customer_reviews.author: J Gill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made product. There is some assembly, but its easy. It is an incredibly stable bed with several (at least 8) points of contact with the floor. No sagging. This model is a solid black, which is hard to find. No complaints of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Snugs

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This bed was exactly what I was expecting when I opened the box. Very easy to assemble, very handsome when set up, and very sturdy. Excellent value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Owen

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: Great to find a twin bed frame that will accommodate a box spring and a mattress. This bed was easy to assemble and looks great! Good quality and a reasonable price. My teenager is very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: laura bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bed But Missing A Mattress Support
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this bed because manly because I needed a new mattress support and it's a very cute bed, When I received it, I loved it even more! Looks very elegant and girly (Which I LOVE). You can adjust the bed frame from twin to king size!!!! It does take more than one person to assemble. The reason why i rate it four stars instead of five is because it doesn't come with a mattress support frame. If you have one great! I recommend this bed!! If not, order one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Godinez

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bed for a guest room and was very pleased with its quality, especially for the cost. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints whatsoever on this purchase. We got the bed in a very timely manner. The bed came in perfect condition. We had no problems at all in putting the bed together. Once it was set up it looks great in the room. I would not be any happier than I am with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nyana Dunagan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: The fashion bed group Sanford bed with matte black finish is easy to assemble, sturdy, looks great. Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as we hoped
customer_reviews.text: We like the look of this bed frame but it is not built as solidly as we had hoped. The rails are hollow and it feels risky to lean back against the rails of the headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Carleton

customer_reviews.title: This is just the headboard and footboard.
customer_reviews.text: The description was misleading. "Sanford Matte Black Bed Twin" made me believe I would be receiving the entire bed but I only received the headboard and footboard. I chose to buy it online to save some money on shipping and taxes but ended up having to go out and buy the actual bed too. I would have been better off buying the entire thing at Target and would have ended up spending less money.
customer_reviews.author: Anne K. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Bed is as nice as it looks in picture, easy to assemble, sturdy, and a good price. I placed in guest room and so far two visitors have complimented it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin E Wince

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed frame for my daughter. She absolutely loved it and it was super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi A Lang

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.....thought it came with a bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and seems well-made. Based on reviews and where I saw it on other sites, thought it came with a bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Silverstein

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this frame. Its very sturdy and It goes great with my apartment. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P.

customer_reviews.title: nice bed
customer_reviews.text: easy to put together and sturdy. only issue is the gap under the lower bar of the head board. pillow keeps slipping through.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Catledge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: The Sanford bed is quite sturdy, fashionable, and elegant in Matte Black. We couldn't be happier with our choice. Excelsior.
customer_reviews.author: David R. Woody

customer_reviews.title: about bed
customer_reviews.text: it met all my expectations I would order it again if necessary it came on time was easy to put together I love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rachis

customer_reviews.title: There is no bed frame included
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product because, despite what the majority of the comments say, there are no side rails or frames included. I only received the headboard and footboard, nothing to connect them. I sent an email to the company asking where the side rails were, and they responded that the side rails were not included. I'm not sure why that's not stated in the description, because I think it would be helpful for people to know that. Anyway, I need a bed frame with all the parts, so I had to return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Tierney

customer_reviews.title: Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed was of decent quality for the money. It did arrive with scratches to a part of the frame though.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Gannon

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Was very easy to assemble and seems to be strong and well constructed. Using it with a memory foam mattress and it's the most comfortable bed I've ever slept on! I don't want to get out of bed in the morning. :)

customer_reviews.title: i like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed, it was kinda hard to assemble though, especially the frame. It looks nice and so far has proven to be stable.
customer_reviews.author: albi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This item came with good packaging and is solidly built. Assembly was pretty easy. It is a simple but attractive bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It looks even better than it did in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Carey

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely bed. Very sturdy. Amazing price. Shipped quickly and very well packed. All pieces were included and no problems with the easy assembly. I am very picky, and I am thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: C. P. J.

customer_reviews.title: not as heavy as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty but kind of light weight. Beware that no frame comes with this! The description said "bed" so I feel like I was mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Henning

customer_reviews.title: Too long, doesn't come with box spring or slats
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have checked the product description more thoroughly but I just never imagined that a) a bed could be sold without any slats, so you can't actually put a mattress onto it, or b) that a bed sold as 'queen size' could be about half a foot longer than a standard queen size mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Kate_Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Sanford Bed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bed and easy assembly, also great price Ordered on Sunday received on Thursday. Looks perfect in small room. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: coach90

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty bed
customer_reviews.text: Love this bed. Went together easily. Looks great! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Dilbeck

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Love the option to rate with stars. Thoroughly dislike that I have to add words to what should clearly be a "rave" review.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bed is not square. Extremely disappointed for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Genie

customer_reviews.title: Not complete bed frame
customer_reviews.text: There were no side rails included. This was not mentioned. We had to purchase quickly on a tight schedule for moving our daughter across country!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: super bed!
customer_reviews.text: I totally love this headboard/footboard! Its really awesome that it comes with a frame too, so then the headboard/footboard fits it exatly! The frame is a little bit longer than the actual matress, but with a bed-skirt it looks fine. This bed is REALLY SUPER sturdy!! I really love this bed and would defenetly reccomend it! It even got to my house BEFORE it was expected to!
customer_reviews.author: June-Bug

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good frame
customer_reviews.text: Headboard end is a little tall, making it a little wobbly, especailly during sex. Otherwise, its a pretty good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

product_meta.title: Leggett & Platt Sanford Complete Metal Bed and Steel Support Frame with Castings and Round Finial Posts, Matte Black Finish, King
product_meta.description:
Color:Matte Black| Size:KingThe Sanford, and its defining characteristics, allows for the option of having a bed that can act as the focal point or background décor. Constructed of carbon steel for stability and years of everyday use, the 52.25-inch headboard and 31.5-inch footboard are detailed with castings and round finial posts. The Matte Black powder coat application finish marries texture to the surface in a way that mutes and plays with light. The (10) castings locked in place on this bed are intentionally finished in the same black powder coat to show only their silhouette and accentuate their simple nature. The engineered bed frame consists of iron rails, cross arms and glides to provide full support to your mattress and box spring. A good ornamental bed, like the Sanford, will fuse with the surrounding décor, accent other bedroom furniture and transform an ordinary room into something interesting and sophisticated. This unit includes a headboard and footboard panel, bed frame, instruction sheet, and hardware bag with everything needed for easy assembly. The Leggett & Platt Sanford Complete Bed comes with a 10-year limited warranty against manufacturing defects. Leggett & Platt Inc. is an industry leader in the production of adjustable bases, fashionable beds, bedding support, and top of bed textiles. By keeping a close eye on the design community and other fashion and decorating sources, Leggett & Platt stays on top of the trends and knows the right mix of finishes, innovative designs, and technology to continually provide quality crafted products at an exceptional value. Leggett & Platt Consumer Products: Value Without Compromise

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Prop 65 Warning: This product can expose you to chemicals including titanium dioxide (airborne, unbound particles of respirable size), which are known to the State of California to cause cancer or birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information, go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov
feature_bullets: King sized complete bed constructed of Carbon Steel with Matte Black powder coat finish
52.25” Headboard and 31.5” footboard features castings, round finial posts and a textured finish
Steel bed frame provides full support to your mattress and box spring
Protected with a 10-year limited warranty against manufacturing defects
